text: James Charles Floyd (born October 20, 1914) is a Canadian aerospace engineer. He was born in Manchester, England. Floyd was the Avro Aircraft Ltd. (Canada) chief design engineer. He helped create the design and development of the Avro Jetliner, CF-100 and CF-105 Arrow aircraft designs.Kyonka, Nick. "Before Apollo, there was Arrow." The Toronto Star, July 21, 2009. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:Canadian centenarians Category:Canadian engineers Category:People from Manchester Category:Aerospace engineers
title: James C. Floyd
